title: PBE in NA, was wondering if there was a way I could get a pbe account for NA if I play on OCE?
body: I don't want to transfer to NA to apply for a PBE account, but I'd be super happy if there was a way I could give my OCE account details to Riot and see if there was a way I could apply as I've done beta testing before and love league of legends. Thanks in advance!!!

replies.body:
Wouldn't that be lagging as hell though?

Anyway, I'm still doubtful this would go through. You could try making a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) for it.

Best of luck.
before oce servers we'd get like 150-200 ping, it wasnt that great... but it was stable :)
That seems playable. I highly doubt you'd be able to play on the NA PBE with your OCE account; most likely you should just make a NA account and apply to the PBE from there.
